fields.label: Show Quick Links?
fields.name: global_display_quicklinks
fields.instructions: Check the box below if you would like to display "Quick Links" at the top of the page

fields.label: Description
fields.message:
Quicklinks will sit at the top of the page and are links that will smoothly scroll users to the links associated content below.   Simply add an ID in the Quick Links ID field.  Next, add a row of content and paste the same ID in the ID field.  ** NOTE:  The ID field must be text and cannot have special characters, spaces, dashes, numerals ect.

- To link to "Request a Quote" at bottom of page, use ID:  requestquote
- To link to "Latest Posts", use ID:  latestposts
